content: Chemistry is the science that studies matter and its properties. This chapter introduces the basic concepts of chemistry, including atoms, molecules, elements, and compounds.

chapter: Chapter 2: The Structure of the Atom
content: The atom is the basic unit of matter. This chapter explores the structure of the atom, including protons, neutrons, and electrons.
The periodic table organizes elements based on their properties. This chapter introduces the periodic table and explores the properties of different elements.
Chemical bonds hold atoms together to form molecules. This chapter examines different types of chemical bonds, including ionic, covalent, and metallic bonds.
Chemical reactions involve the rearrangement of atoms and molecules. This chapter explores different types of chemical reactions and how to balance chemical equations.
